name: py-aiohttp
description:
Supports both client and server side of HTTP protocol. Supports both
client and server Web-Sockets out-of-the-box and avoids Callbacks.
Provides Web-server with middlewares and plugable routing.

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-chardet
dependencies.description: Universal encoding detector for Python 2 and 3

dependencies.name: py-multidict
dependencies.description:
Multidict is dict-like collection of key-value pairs where key might be
occurred more than once in the container.

dependencies.name: py-yarl
dependencies.description: The module provides handy URL class for URL parsing and changing.

dependencies.name: py-idna-ssl
dependencies.description: Patch ssl.match_hostname for Unicode(idna) domains support

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependent_to.name: py-sentry-sdk
dependent_to.description: The new Python SDK for Sentry.io

dependent_to.name: py-black
dependent_to.description:
Black is the uncompromising Python code formatter. By using it, you
agree to cede control over minutiae of hand-formatting. In return, Black
gives you speed, determinism, and freedom from pycodestyle nagging about
formatting.

dependent_to.name: py-aiohttp-cors
dependent_to.description:
aiohttp_cors library implements Cross Origin Resource Sharing (CORS)
support for aiohttp asyncio-powered asynchronous HTTP server.

dependent_to.name: py-gql
dependent_to.description:
This is a GraphQL client for Python. Plays nicely with graphene,
graphql-core, graphql-js and any other GraphQL implementation compatible
with the spec. GQL architecture is inspired by React-Relay and Apollo-
Client.

dependent_to.name: py-ray
dependent_to.description:
A system for parallel and distributed Python that unifies the ML
ecosystem.

dependent_to.name: py-aiobotocore
dependent_to.description: Async client for amazon services using botocore and aiohttp/asyncio.
